scripts.setup:wasm: npm run build:wasm && npm run copy:wasm
scripts.dev: npm run setup:wasm && cd react-wasm && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run setup:wasm && cd react-wasm && npm run build
scripts.watch:wasm: npm run build:wasm && npm run copy:wasm
scripts.clean: rm -rf wasm_lib/pkg wasm_lib/target react-wasm/src/wasm_pkg react-wasm/dist react-wasm/node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:frontend && npm run setup:wasm
